title: BARD - Elon v Twitter, HOV v Dobbs & Timmons v Social Media
itunes:title: BARD - Elon v Twitter, HOV v Dobbs & Timmons v Social Media
description:
Mark and Gary continue their Sunday tradition with a BARD covering a wide range of topics including Elon's real motivations in 'pulling out' of the Twitter deal, an interesting case out of Texas with brand new implications and shenanigans galore out of South Carolina with an unexpected Jo Koy tie in.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
